# semantic

**Instance Property**

The intended use of the texture.

## Declaration

```swift
var semantic: TextureResource.Semantic?
```

## Texture resource creation options

- **mipmapsMode**: Whether the texture resource automatically generates mipmaps.

items.description: Whether the texture resource automatically generates mipmaps.
